00158 template <typename Base>
00159 inline void TMathVectorWrap<Base>::Translate(const TMathVectorWrap<Base>& vector)
00160 {
00161        int elementsCount = qMin(BaseClass::GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());
00162        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00163               BaseClass::GetElementRef(i) += vector.GetElement(i);
00164        }
00165 }

00189 template <typename Base>
00190 inline typename Base::ElementType TMathVectorWrap<Base>::GetDotProduct(const TMathVectorWrap<Base>& vector) const
00191 {
00192        typename Base::ElementType retVal = 0.0;
00193 
00194        int elementsCount = qMin(BaseClass::GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());
00195        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00196               retVal +=  BaseClass::GetElement(i) * vector.GetElement(i);
00197        }
00198 
00199        return retVal;
00200 }

00233 template <typename Base>
00234 inline bool TMathVectorWrap<Base>::operator==(const TMathVectorWrap<Base>& vector) const
00235 {
00236        int elementsCount = BaseClass::GetElementsCount();
00237        if (elementsCount != vector.GetElementsCount()){
00238               return false;
00239        }
00240 
00241        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00242               if (BaseClass::GetElement(i) != vector.GetElement(i)){
00243                      return false;
00244               }
00245        }
00246        return true;
00247 }

00257 template <typename Base>
00258 bool TMathVectorWrap<Base>::operator<(const TMathVectorWrap<Base>& vector) const
00259 {
00260        int elementsCount = qMin(BaseClass::GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());
00261        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00262               typename Base::ElementType firstElement = BaseClass::GetElement(i);
00263               typename Base::ElementType secondElement = vector.GetElement(i);
00264 
00265               if (firstElement > secondElement){
00266                      return false;
00267               }
00268               else if (firstElement < secondElement){
00269                      return true;
00270               }
00271        }
00272

00471 template <typename Base>
00472 bool TMathVectorWrap<Base>::Normalize(typename Base::ElementType length)
00473 {
00474     typename Base::ElementType isLength = GetLength();
00475 
00476     typename Base::ElementType proportion = isLength / length;
00477 
00478        if (::fabs(proportion) > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00479               int elementsCount = BaseClass::GetElementsCount();
00480               for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00481                      BaseClass::SetElement(i, BaseClass::GetElement(i) / proportion);
00482         }
00483 
00484               return true;
00485     }
00486        else{
00487               return false;
00488        }
00489 }
00490

00492 template <typename Base>
00493 bool TMathVectorWrap<Base>::GetNormalized(TMathVectorWrap<Base>& result, typename Base::ElementType length) const
00494 {
00495     typename Base::ElementType isLength = GetLength();
00496 
00497     typename Base::ElementType proportion = isLength / length;
00498 
00499        if (::fabs(proportion) > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00500               int elementsCount = BaseClass::GetElementsCount();
00501               result.SetElementsCount(elementsCount);
00502               for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00503                      result.SetElement(i, BaseClass::GetElement(i) / proportion);
00504         }
00505 
00506               return true;
00507     }
00508        else{
00509               return false;
00510        }
00511 }

00513 
00514 template <typename Base>
00515 bool TMathVectorWrap<Base>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00516 {
00517        bool retVal = true;
00518 
00519        int elementsCount = BaseClass::GetElementsCount();
00520 
00521        static iser::CArchiveTag elementsTag("Elements", "List of vector element");
00522        static iser::CArchiveTag elementTag("Element", "Single vector element");
00523 
00524        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(elementsTag, elementTag, elementsCount);
00525 
00526        if (!retVal){
00527               return false;
00528        }
00529 
00530        if (!archive.IsStoring()){
00531               BaseClass::SetElementsCount(elementsCount);
00532        }
00533 
00534     for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00535               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(elementTag);
00536               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(BaseClass::GetElementRef(i));
00537               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(elementTag);
00538        }
00539 
00540        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(elementsTag);
00541 
00542        return retVal;
00543 }
